Text: GriffithGriffith will not run on January rd or th We have nominated for the rd and will be moving it all cycle The plan is for Griffith to come online Monday January th with the same schedule as the rd and th for more testing Well keep you posted of any additional changes Becky

Griffith Plant Nominations for Duke EnergyPlease confirm the following nominations for the Griffith Power Plant for the weekend of January Saturday the th No nominations needed Sunday the th for mmbtus Total Burn for the day mmbtus Monday the st for mmbtus and for mmbtus Total Burn for the day Tuesday the nd for mmbtus and for mmbtus Total Burn for the day If you have any questions please call me at or my cell at Thank you Becky Newson Duke Energy
